name: Color Factory Plus
description:
Color Factory Plus App works ONLY on iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus and IPhone X

Color Factory Plus allows you to choose your color preferences, group them in 4 color swatches and produce Color Schemes

Study colors on its three dimensional space, see it in a 3D dynamic graphic display and get their color numeric values in RGB and DMX.

Color Factory Plus is a very useful application for Cinematographers, Photographers, VFX artists, Production Designers, Art Designers, Lighting Designers, Graphic Designers, Film Colorists and Film and TV Directors, who needs to choose and precise colors.

Lighting Designers can have precise color values to program DMX systems.

Important color information to communicate between Visual Production departments.

Color Factory Plus works in 3 Color Dimensions:

RGB Color Space (Primary Colors) and
HSB Color Space (Hue, Saturation and Brightness)

Using the Color Factory Plus you will find one of 16777 colors of your choice and have its numeric values on:

RGB and DMX Color ( 0 to 255)
Hue Color Vector values in degrees
